election_record.label: New Hampshire 1807 Governor

overview.note: The New Hampshire Federalists made no organized effort to elect a Governor. Their votes were scattered among several candidates.

sub_unit.name: Coventry
sub_unit.note: The votes from Coventry were not included in the Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Haverhill
sub_unit.note: The Dartmouth Gazette (Hanover NH), March 27, reports 34 votes for Oliver Peabody in Haverhill.

sub_unit.name: Lyman
sub_unit.note: The votes in Lyman were not included in the Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Nottingham West
sub_unit.note: History of Hudson, N.H. lists Justus Dakin with 1 vote.

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. New Hampshire Archives and Records Management, Concord.
